metadata.name: BLLV1
metadata.description:
V3GA G3N3SIS is a collection of mechanical spirits.   A mirror into our cybernetic ecology.  Future ancestors synthesized from our collective mech fantasies.

This project is a dance between AI and humans.  The base image was made by AI using a database of robots from pop culture meticulously curated by Nude Robot. Then the original image is reimaged into 4D by Nude Robot with custom sound design by Sentinel and Justin  Kelly.

This project was made in 2021 using style gan 2 technology.  This work marks Nude Robot's earliest and most concrete vision of artificial intelligence being used as a tool for creative exploration.
